title: Ticket #1105: New Classads: get collector working
description:
The collector built with --disable-old-classads always finds 0 matches to any query (or, at least, any query that I've tried so far). This behavior seems less than optimal.

I really don't have a feel for how much effort this will require, so I'm initially slapping this coming Friday as the due date; I may adjust it after investigation.
remarks:
2010-Jan-14 16:39:46 by jfrey:
Pushed a fix to V7_5-new_classads-branch.
check_ins: 2010-Jan-14 16:38   Check-in [16896]: Fix EvalExprTree() in ClassAd compat layer. #1105 When the expression evaluates to a boolean, EvalExprTree() should return an integer value in EvalResult. This makes the collector respond properly to queries when not using old ClassAds. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
